name: Devil's Third
overview: From the creative mind of legendary designer Tomonobu Itagaki, Devil’s Third is an over-the-top, third-person action shooter that combines modern military weaponry with ninja-style swordplay and melee combat. The Wii U version of Devil’s Third features both a full multiplayer mode as well as an exciting single-player story mode. Its single player mode immerses players in an engrossing storyline set against a background of intrigue and global military conflict. In parallel, the multiplayer mode lets players blast and slash each other in deep and challenging online combat that blends clan-based action, resource management and strategy.
